COMMENTS: Description of datasets available for CMCT comparisons
COMMENT: known_datasets: List of all the available datasets
Below here, a section for each dataset in known_datasets

icesat-cism-elev-grn.desc: ICESat GLAS Elevations, Greenland, for CISM

icesat-cmctnc-tpelev-grn.desc: ICESat GLAS elevations, T/P ellipsoid, Greenland, CMCT netCDF

icesat-cmctnc-wgselev-grn.desc: ICESat GLAS elevations, WGS84 ellipsoid, Greenland, CMCT netCDF

icesat-cmctnc-egmmtelev-grn.desc: ICESat GLAS elevations, EGM08 mean-tide, Greenland, CMCT netCDF

icesat-cmctnc-egmtfelev-grn.desc: ICESat GLAS elevations, EGM08 tide-free, Greenland, CMCT netCDF
